Sentencas: The ionic conductivity of the interlayer in the intermediate temperature solid oxide electrolysis cell (IT-SOEC) affects the polarization resistance of the oxygen electrode.
Titulo: Improved performance of a samarium-doped ceria interlayer of intermediate temperature solid oxide electrolysis cells by doping the transition metal oxide Fe2O3

Sentencas: Improving the ionic conductivity of the interlayer can improve the performance of the oxygen electrode.
Titulo: Improved performance of a samarium-doped ceria interlayer of intermediate temperature solid oxide electrolysis cells by doping the transition metal oxide Fe2O3

Sentencas: In this work, the ionic conductivity of a samarium-doped ceria (SDC) interlayer is improved by doping the transition metal oxide Fe2O3.
Titulo: Improved performance of a samarium-doped ceria interlayer of intermediate temperature solid oxide electrolysis cells by doping the transition metal oxide Fe2O3

Sentencas: The experimental results show that the oxygen electrode polarization resistance of the symmetrical cell based on the SDC-Fe2O3 interlayer is 0.09 omega cm(-2) at 800 degrees C and under the open circuit voltage, which is obviously lower than that of the symmetrical cell based on an SDC interlayer (0.22 omega cm(-2)).
Titulo: Improved performance of a samarium-doped ceria interlayer of intermediate temperature solid oxide electrolysis cells by doping the transition metal oxide Fe2O3

Sentencas: Besides, the electrolysis current of the SOEC based on the SDC-Fe2O3 interlayer is 0.5 A cm(-2) at 800 degrees C and 1.5 V, which is higher than that of the SOEC based on the SDC interlayer (0.3 A cm(-2)).
Titulo: Improved performance of a samarium-doped ceria interlayer of intermediate temperature solid oxide electrolysis cells by doping the transition metal oxide Fe2O3

Sentencas: The above results show that improving the ionic conductivity of the SDC interlayer in the SOEC by doping Fe2O3 can reduce the polarization resistance of the oxygen electrode and enhance the performance of the SOEC.
Titulo: Improved performance of a samarium-doped ceria interlayer of intermediate temperature solid oxide electrolysis cells by doping the transition metal oxide Fe2O3

Sentencas: Thus, this work provides an effective way for improving the performance of the SDC interlayer in the IT-SOEC.
Titulo: Improved performance of a samarium-doped ceria interlayer of intermediate temperature solid oxide electrolysis cells by doping the transition metal oxide Fe2O3
